text:
I was curious to know if It was possible to create a standalone module that acts as a ReactJS app that meets the following criteria
1. Design manager only (no transpiling on local computer and pushing through the CLI)
2. compatible with IE11 all the way through chrome latest
and the result is, yes, it's possible <https://2660705.hs-sites.com/v40fullfeature-0-0?hs_preview=jDoVWPiF-33931349760>
Now we know
